Class: mzDropDownTree

mzDropDownTree()

new mzDropDownTree()

mzDropDownTree is a jQuery plugin used to create a dropdown tree structure with html5 detail and summary tags. It is a lightweight powerful plugin which can be used to either create nested checkbox list from either static or remote data source.
